    public class Saver
extends java.lang.Object
implements SaverInterface
    TODO <>no support for changing question numbers at the moment. TODO some conflict checking must go in here. Server side real methods for handling user data.

      • saveQuiz

        public boolean saveQuiz(Quiz quiz)
        each quiz has a config file, which has the name of the quiz and stores the name of the quiz object file, and associated questions. returns false if config file doesnt exist, which means it's not in the structure, which means that addquiz hasnt been called first.
        Specified by:
        saveQuiz in interface SaverInterface
        Returns:
        true if saving the object is successful.
